body.p:
Dear sir the cases that write & in in the Rockcastle Circuit Court 1/3 cases ought to be pardoned they done nothing but what we right thinking thought that they were Rebbls they had foght in the Union Army and was such than there --
-- they have done their duty I hope that you will pardon them I will be responsible for this pardon and will defend you

Yours Truly
Granville Pearl
Judge of the 19th Judicial Distric of Ky
